title: Student Medium Dark Skin Tone
description: Represents a student with a medium-dark skin tone, often used in contexts related to education, learning, graduation, or academic pursuits.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the student emoji with medium-dark skin tone is portrayed with an intelligent and focused demeanor, often holding a book or wearing glasses, representing learning and academic pursuits. Apple’s design language imbues this figure with soft rounded edges and realistic lighting, making them appear approachable and dedicated. This emoji is ideal for discussing studies, exams, graduation, or a general sense of intellectual curiosity.
